trans-unit.source: The query method allows you to execute any SQL query on the WordPress database. It is best used when there is a need for specific, custom, or otherwise complex SQL queries. trans-unit.source: The wp_filter_post_kses() function is added to the ‘content_save_pre’, ‘excerpt_save_pre’, and ‘content_filtered_save_pre’ hooks.

trans-unit.source: The wp_footer action is triggered near the tag of the user’s template by the wp_footer() function. Although this is theme-dependent, it is one of the most essential theme hooks, so it is fairly widely supported.
trans-unit.target: 该 wp_footer 动作触发的标签附近用户的模板由wp_footer（）函数。尽管这取决于主题，但它是最重要的主题挂钩之一，因此得到了广泛的支持。

trans-unit.source: The wp_insert_post action fires once a post has been saved. You have the ability to set it to only fire on new posts or on all save actions using the parameters. Please see Plugin_API/Action_Reference/save_post for more information. Keep in mind that this action is called both for actions in the admin as well as anytime the wp_insert_post() function is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 该 wp_insert_post 动作触发一次后已保存。您可以使用参数将其设置为仅在新帖子或所有保存操作上触发。有关更多信息，请参见Plugin_API / Action_Reference / save_post。请记住，无论是在admin中还是在调用wp_insert_post（）函数时，都将同时调用此操作。

trans-unit.source: The wp_loaded action fires after init but before admin_init.
trans-unit.target: 该 wp_loaded 初始化之后，但在行动火灾 admin_init 。

trans-unit.source: The wp_login action hook is triggered when a user logs in by the wp_signon() function. It is the very last action taken in the function, immediately following the wp_set_auth_cookie() call.
trans-unit.target: 所述 wp_login 当用户在由记录动作钩被触发wp_signon（）函数。这是函数中紧接wp_set_auth_cookie（）调用后执行的最后一项操作。

trans-unit.source: The wp_logout action hook is triggered when a user logs out using the wp_logout() function. The action is executed after the wp_clear_auth_cookie() function call.
trans-unit.target: 所述 wp_logout 当用户注销时使用的动作钩被触发wp_logout（）函数。该操作在wp_clear_auth_cookie（）函数调用之后执行。

trans-unit.source: The wp_mail_from filter modifies the “from email address” used in an email sent using the wp_mail() function. When used together with the ‘wp_mail_from_name‘ filter, it creates a from address like “Name”. The filter should return an email address.
trans-unit.target: 所述 wp_mail_from 滤波器修改在电子邮件中所用的“从电子邮件地址的”使用发送wp_mail（）函数。与“ wp_mail_from_name ”过滤器一起使用时，它会创建一个发件人地址，例如“ Name”。过滤器应返回一个电子邮件地址。

trans-unit.source: The wp_title filter is used to filter the title of the page (called with wp_title()). This filters the text appearing in the HTML <title> tag (sometimes called the “title tag” or “meta title”), not the post, page, or category title.
trans-unit.target: 该 wp_title 过滤器用于过滤网页的标题（调用 wp_title() ）。这将过滤显示在HTML <title>标记（有时称为“ title标记”或“元标题”）中的文本，而不是帖子，页面或类别标题。

trans-unit.source: The Users menu is only available to users with the ability to edit other users. Users with capability below this level will see a Profile menu instead.
trans-unit.target: “用户”菜单仅对具有编辑其他用户能力的用户可用。能力低于此级别的用户将改为查看个人资料菜单。

trans-unit.source: The main query (object) already has some default properties set depending on the page request. For example, for single posts the $query->is_single property is set to true. This means you can’t simply change a single post or page query into an archive of posts query (or the other way around). To achieve this you’ll have to reset these properties in the query object itself. Unless you are intimately familiar with these settings and are willing to coordinate them yourself, it’s suggested that you replace the main query by using WP_Query in the page.php or single.php (child) theme template files.
trans-unit.target: 根据页面请求，主查询（对象）已经设置了一些默认属性。例如，对于单个帖子， $query->is_single 属性设置为true。这意味着您不能简单地将单个帖子或页面查询更改为帖子查询的存档（或相反）。为此，您必须在查询对象本身中重置这些属性。除非你非常熟悉这些设置，并愿意对他们自己的坐标，它建议你使用更换主查询WP_Query在page.php文件或single.php中（子）主题模板文件。

trans-unit.source: The register_new_user() function inserts a new user into the WordPress database. This function is used when a new user registers through WordPress’ Login Page. It differs from wp_create_user() in that it requires a valid username and email address but doesn’t allow to choose a password, generating a random one using wp_generate_password(). If you want to create a new user with a specific password or with additional parameters, use wp_create_user() or wp_insert_user() instead.
trans-unit.target: 该register_new_user（）函数插入一个新的用户到WordPress数据库。当新用户通过WordPress的登录页面进行注册时，将使用此功能。它与wp_create_user（）的不同之处在于，它需要一个有效的用户名和电子邮件地址，但不允许选择密码，而是使用wp_generate_password（）生成一个随机密码。如果要使用特定密码或其他参数创建新用户，请改用wp_create_user（）或wp_insert_user（）。

trans-unit.source: The CSS class to use for the $title_li. Default 'linkcat'.
trans-unit.target: 要为$title_li使用的CSS类。默认为'linkcat'。

trans-unit.source: The Diff is available for getting the changes between versions. The output is HTML, so the primary use is for displaying the changes. If the two strings are equivalent, then an empty string will be returned.
trans-unit.target: Diff可以用来获取不同版本之间的变化。输出是HTML,所以主要用于显示变化。如果两个字符串相等,那么将返回一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The Filter button allows sorting by date and/or category on the Posts list table, and sorting by date on the Pages list table.
trans-unit.target: 筛选按钮可以在 "帖子 "列表表上按日期和/或类别排序,在 "页面 "列表表上按日期排序。

trans-unit.source: The HTML contents of the $policy_text supports use of a specialized .privacy-policy-tutorial CSS class which can be used to provide supplemental information. trans-unit.source: The browser’s request for events is proxied with this method, rather than having the browser make the request directly to api.wordpress.org, because it allows results to be cached server-side and shared with other users and sites in the network. This makes the process more efficient, since increasing the number of visits that get cached data means users don’t have to wait as often; if the user’s browser made the request directly, it would also need to make a second request to WP in order to pass the data for caching. Having WP make the request also introduces the opportunity to anonymize the IP before sending it to w.org, which mitigates possible privacy concerns.
trans-unit.target: 浏览器对事件的请求使用此方法代替，而不是让浏览器直接向api.wordpress.org发出请求，因为它允许将结果缓存在服务器端并与网络中的其他用户和站点共享。由于增加了获取缓存数据的访问次数，这意味着用户不必等待那么长时间，因此使过程更加高效。如果用户的浏览器直接发出请求，则还需要向WP发出第二个请求，以便传递数据进行缓存。通过WP发出请求，还引入了在将IP发送给w.org之前对IP进行匿名处理的机会，从而减轻了可能的隐私问题。

trans-unit.source: The button is only displayed if a URL is returned by wp_get_direct_php_update_url().
trans-unit.target: 仅当 wp_get_direct_php_update_url() 返回URL时，才显示该按钮。

trans-unit.source: The class itself simply “walks” through each node in a tree (e.g. an object or associative array) and executes an abstract function at each node. In order to take an action at one of these nodes, a developer must define those abstract methods within a custom child class.
trans-unit.target: 类本身只是简单地“遍历”树中的每个节点（例如，对象或关联数组），并在每个节点上执行抽象函数。为了在这些节点之一上执行操作，开发人员必须在自定义子类中定义那些抽象方法。

trans-unit.source: The class names are many. If the post is a sticky, then the ‘sticky’ class name. The class ‘hentry’ is always added to each post. If the post has a post thumbnail, ‘has-post-thumbnail’ is added as a class. For each taxonomy that the post belongs to, a class will be added of the format ‘{$taxonomy}-{$slug}’ – eg ‘category-foo’ or ‘my_custom_taxonomy-bar’.
trans-unit.target: 类名很多。如果帖子是粘性的，则为“粘性”类名。类“ hentry”总是添加到每个帖子中。如果帖子具有帖子缩略图，则将“ has-post-thumbnail”添加为一个类。对于帖子所属的每种分类法，将添加格式为“ {{$ taxonomy}-{$ slug}””的类，例如“ category-foo”或“ my_custom_taxonomy-bar”。

trans-unit.source: The default content type is ‘text/plain’ which does not allow using HTML. You can set the content type of the email either by using the ‘wp_mail_content_type‘ filter ( see example below), or by including a header like “Content-type: text/html”. Be careful to reset ‘wp_mail_content_type’ back to ‘text/plain’ after you send your message, though, because failing to do so could lead to unexpected problems with e-mails from WP or plugins/themes.
trans-unit.target: 默认的内容类型是“文本/纯文本”，不允许使用HTML。您可以通过使用'wp_mail_content_type '过滤器（请参见下面的示例），或通过包含诸如“ Content-type：text / html”之类的标题来设置电子邮件的内容类型。但是，发送邮件后，请小心将“ wp_mail_content_type”重置为“文本/纯文本”，因为不这样做可能会导致WP或插件/主题的电子邮件出现意外问题。

trans-unit.source: The default message can be replaced by using a drop-in (maintenance.php in the wp-content directory).
trans-unit.target: 可以使用投稿的方式替换默认的信息(在wp-content目录下的main维护.php)。

trans-unit.source: The default now takes the original memory_limit into account.
trans-unit.target: 现在，默认值将原始的 memory_limit 考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The default output may include padding due to the term’s current level in the term hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 由于术语在术语层次结构中的当前级别，默认输出可能包括填充。

trans-unit.source: The default supported recurrences are ‘hourly’, ‘twicedaily’, ‘daily’, and ‘weekly’. A plugin may add more by hooking into the ‘cron_schedules’ filter. The filter accepts an array of arrays. The outer array has a key that is the name of the schedule, for example ‘monthly’. The value is an array with two keys, one is ‘interval’ and the other is ‘display’.
trans-unit.target: 支持的默认重复周期为“每小时”，“每天两次”，“每天”和“每周”。插件可以通过插入“ cron_schedules”过滤器来添加更多内容。过滤器接受一个数组数组。外部数组具有一个密钥，该密钥是日程表的名称，例如“每月”。该值是一个带有两个键的数组，一个键是“ interval”，另一个键是“ display”。

trans-unit.source: The default supported recurrences are ‘hourly’, ‘twicedaily’, and ‘daily’. A plugin may add more by hooking into the ‘cron_schedules’ filter. The filter accepts an array of arrays. The outer array has a key that is the name of the schedule or for example ‘weekly’. The value is an array with two keys, one is ‘interval’ and the other is ‘display’.
trans-unit.target: 支持的默认重复周期为“每小时”，“每周两次”和“每天”。插件可以通过插入“ cron_schedules”过滤器来添加更多内容。过滤器接受一个数组数组。外部数组的键是日程表的名称，例如“每周”。该值是一个带有两个键的数组，一个是'interval'，另一个是'display'。

trans-unit.source: The default value changed to true.
trans-unit.target: 默认值改为 "true"。

trans-unit.source: The default value of EMPTY_TRASH_DAYS is 30 (days).
trans-unit.target: EMPTY_TRASH_DAYS 的默认值为30（天）。

trans-unit.source: The default value of the $locales parameter changed to include all locales.
trans-unit.target: $locales 参数的默认值已更改为包括所有语言环境。

trans-unit.source: The default value returned from get_metadata() if no value has been set yet. When using a non-single meta key, the default value is for the first entry. In other words, when calling get_metadata() with $single set to false, the default value given here will be wrapped in an array.
trans-unit.target: 如果尚未设置值，则从get_metadata（）返回的默认值。当使用非单个元密钥时，默认值为第一项。换句话说，在将 $single 设置为 false 的情况下调用get_metadata（）时，此处给出的默认值将包装在数组中。

trans-unit.source: The default value was changed to 'strict-origin-when-cross-origin'.
trans-unit.target: 默认值被改为'严格原产地-交叉原产地'。

trans-unit.source: The default widget option is ‘classname’ that can be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 默认的窗口小部件选项是“类名”，可以覆盖。

trans-unit.source: The depth of the new comment. Must be greater than 0 and less than the value of the 'thread_comments_depth' option set in Settings > Discussion. Default 0.
trans-unit.target: 新评论的深度。必须大于0且小于“设置”>“讨论”中设置的“ thread_comments_depth”选项的值。默认值0。

trans-unit.source: The depth of the recursiveness can be controlled by the $levels param.
trans-unit.target: 递归的深度可以通过$levels param来控制。

trans-unit.source: The description of the theme
trans-unit.target: 主题说明

trans-unit.source: The descriptor type used in the image candidate string, either 'w' or 'x'.
trans-unit.target: 图像候选字符串中使用的描述符类型,可以是 "w "或 "x"。

trans-unit.source: The difference between this method and WP_Rewrite::rewrite_rules() is that this method stores the rewrite rules in the ‘rewrite_rules’ option and retrieves it. This prevents having to process all of the permalinks to get the rewrite rules in the form of caching.
trans-unit.target: 此方法与WP_Rewrite :: rewrite_rules（）之间的区别在于，此方法将重写规则存储在'rewrite_rules'选项中并进行检索。这避免了必须处理所有永久链接来获得缓存形式的重写规则。

trans-unit.source: The difference is returned in a human readable format such as "1 hour", "5 mins", "2 days".
trans-unit.target: 差额以 "1小时"、"5分钟"、"2天 "等人类可读的格式返回。

trans-unit.source: The directory name of the theme’s “stylesheet” files, inside the theme root.
trans-unit.target: 主题根目录内主题的“样式表”文件的目录名称。

trans-unit.source: The directory name of the theme’s “template” files, inside the theme root.
trans-unit.target: 主题根目录内主题的“模板”文件的目录名称。

trans-unit.source: The do-it-all function that takes a URL and attempts to return the HTML.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个URL并试图返回HTML的万能函数。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic hook name, $option, refers to the per_page option depending on the type of list table in use. Possible values include: ‘edit_comments_per_page’, ‘sites_network_per_page’, ‘site_themes_network_per_page’, ‘themes_network_per_page’, ‘users_network_per_page’, ‘edit_post_per_page’, ‘edit_page_per_page’, ‘edit_{$post_type}_per_page’, etc.
trans-unit.target: 动态挂钩名称$ option 取决于使用的列表表的类型，它指的是 per_page 选项。可能的值包括：“ edit_comments_per_page”，“ sites_network_per_page”，“ site_themes_network_per_page”，“ themes_network_per_page”，“ users_network_per_page”，“ edit_post_per_page”，“ edit_page_per_page”，“ edit _ {$ post_type} _per_page”等。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic hook name, $option, refers to the per_page option depending on the type of list table in use. Possible filter names include:
trans-unit.target: 动态挂钩名称 $option 取决于使用的列表表的类型，它指的是 per_page 选项。可能的过滤器名称包括：

trans-unit.target: 过滤器 $this->post_type 的动态部分是指控制器的帖子类型。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the filter name, $field, refers to the term field name.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器名称 $field 的动态部分是指术语字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the filter name, $field, refers to the term field.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器名称 $field 的动态部分是指术语field。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the filter name, $taxonomy, refers to the slug of the term’s taxonomy.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the filter name, $taxonomy, refers to the taxonomy slug.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器名称 $taxonomy 的动态部分是指分类标段。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the filter, $this->post_type, refers to the post type slug for the controller.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器的动态部分 $this->post_type 引用控制器的柱子类型。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $_REQUEST['action'], refers to the name of the Ajax action callback being fired.
trans-unit.target: 钩子名称的动态部分 $_REQUEST['action'] 指的是被触发的Ajax操作回调的名称。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $action, refers to the name of the Ajax action callback being fired.
trans-unit.target: 钩子名称 $action 的动态部分是指被触发的Ajax操作回调的名称。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $action, refers to the post action.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $action 的动态部分指的是后操作。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $adjacent, refers to the type of adjacency, ‘next’ or ‘previous’.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $adjacent 的动态部分是指邻接的类型“下一个”或“上一个”。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $adjacent, refers to the type of adjacency, either ‘next’, or ‘previous’.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $adjacent 的动态部分是指邻接的类型，即“下一个”或“上一个”。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $context, refers to an arbitrary context passed on calling the function. This allows for plugins to define their own contexts for raising the memory limit.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $context 的动态部分是指调用函数时传递的任意上下文。这允许插件定义它们自己的上下文以提高内存限制。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $context, refers to the context where extra headers might be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $context 的动态部分是指可能会加载额外头的上下文。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $feature, refers to the specific theme feature. Possible values include ‘post-formats’, ‘post-thumbnails’, ‘custom-background’, ‘custom-header’, ‘menus’, ‘automatic-feed-links’, ‘html5’, ‘starter-content’, and ‘customize-selective-refresh-widgets’.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $feature 的动态部分指的是特定的主题功能。可能的值包括“ post-formats”，“ post-thumbnails”，“ custom-background”，“ custom-header”，“ menus”，“ automatic-feed-links”，“ html5”，“ starter-content”和“自定义选择性刷新小部件”。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $feature, refers to the specific theme feature. See add_theme_support() for the list of possible values.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $feature 的动态部分指的是特定的主题功能。有关可能值的列表，请参见add_theme_support（）。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $feed, refers to the feed template name. Possible values include: ‘rdf’, ‘rss’, ‘rss2’, and ‘atom’.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $feed 的动态部分是指提要模板名称。可能的值包括：“ rdf”，“ rss”，“ rss2”和“ atom”。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $field, corresponds to each of the post fields of the revision object being iterated over in a foreach statement.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $field 的动态部分对应于在foreach语句中迭代的修订对象的每个post字段。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $field, refers to the post field name.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $field 的动态部分是指发布字段名称。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $field, refers to the prefixed user field being filtered, such as ‘user_login’, ‘user_email’, ‘first_name’, etc.
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $field 的动态部分是指要过滤的带前缀用户字段，例如'user_login'，'user_email'，'first_name'等。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $id_base refers to the base slug of the setting name.

trans-unit.target: 钩子名称的动态部分 $id_base 指的是设置名称的基础信息，从 $this->id_data['base'] 初始化。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $meta_type, refers to the meta object type (comment, post, term, or user).
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $meta_type 的动态部分是指元对象类型（注释，帖子，术语或用户）。

trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称 $name 的动态部分是指修改数组的键名称。例如，根据主题选项，“ header_textcolor”，“ header_image”等。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $object_type refers to the object type being filtered. The dynamic portion of the hook name, $object_subtype refers to the object subtype being filtered. The dynamic portion of the hook name, $meta_key, refers to the meta key passed to map_meta_cap().
trans-unit.target: 挂钩名称的动态部分 $object_type 要过滤的对象类型。挂钩名称的动态部分 $object_subtype 要过滤的对象子类型。挂钩名称 $meta_key 的动态部分是指传递给map_meta_cap（）的元密钥。

trans-unit.target: 钩子名称的动态部分 $screen->id 指的是特定屏幕的ID。例如，“帖子”列表表的屏幕ID为edit-post，因此该屏幕的过滤器为manage_edit-post_columns。

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook name, $type, refers to the filename — minus the file extension and any non-alphanumeric characters delimiting words — of the file to load. This hook also applies to various types of files loaded as part of the Template Hierarchy.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portion of the hook, $domain, refers to the text domain.

trans-unit.source: The dynamic portions of the hook name, $object_type, $meta_key, and $object_subtype, refer to the metadata object type (comment, post, term, or user), the meta key value, and the object subtype respectively.

trans-unit.source: The editor can be initialized when needed after page load. See wp.editor.initialize() in wp-admin/js/editor.js for initialization options.
trans-unit.target: 在页面加载后,需要时可以对编辑器进行初始化。初始化选项请参见wp-admin/js/editor.js中的wp.editor.initialize()。

trans-unit.source: The elements returned in the array are:
trans-unit.target: 数组中返回的元素是:

trans-unit.source: The endpoint mask defining which endpoints are added to the structure. Accepts EP_NONE, EP_PERMALINK, EP_ATTACHMENT, EP_DATE, EP_YEAR, EP_MONTH, EP_DAY, EP_ROOT, EP_COMMENTS, EP_SEARCH, EP_CATEGORIES, EP_TAGS, EP_AUTHORS, EP_PAGES, EP_ALL_ARCHIVES, and EP_ALL. Default EP_NONE.
trans-unit.target: 定义将哪些端点添加到结构的端点掩码。接受 EP_NONE ， EP_PERMALINK ， EP_ATTACHMENT ， EP_DATE ， EP_YEAR ， EP_MONTH ， EP_DAY ， EP_ROOT ， EP_COMMENTS ， EP_SEARCH ， EP_CATEGORIES ， EP_TAGS ， EP_AUTHORS ， EP_PAGES ， EP_ALL_ARCHIVES 和 EP_ALL 。默认值 EP_NONE 。

trans-unit.target: 整个功能可以通过

trans-unit.source: The enveloping technique is used to work around browser/client compatibility issues. Essentially, it converts the full HTTP response to data instead.
trans-unit.target: 包络技术用于解决浏览器/客户端的兼容性问题。基本上,它将完整的HTTP响应转换为数据。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of get_param(), but returns all parameters for the request. Handles merging all the available values into a single array.
trans-unit.target: 相当于get_param(),但返回请求的所有参数。处理将所有可用的值合并成一个数组。

trans-unit.source: The error code can only contain one error data.
trans-unit.target: 错误代码只能包含一个错误数据。

trans-unit.source: The error codes used in WordPress are not integers, but strings, with any spaces between words replaced with underscores (example:
trans-unit.target: WordPress中使用的错误代码不是整数,而是字符串,字与字之间的任何空格都用下划线代替(例如。

trans-unit.target: 错误类型现在被归类为E_USER_DEPRECATED(过去默认为E_USER_NOTICE)。

trans-unit.source: The error type.
trans-unit.target: 错误类型。

trans-unit.source: The excerpt word amount will be 55 words and if the amount is greater than that, then the string ‘ […]’ will be appended to the excerpt. If the string is less than 55 words, then the content will be returned as is.
trans-unit.target: 摘录单词的数量为55个单词，如果数量大于该数量，则字符串“ […]”将附加到摘录中。如果字符串少于55个单词，则将按原样返回内容。

trans-unit.source: The execution will be halted as soon as one of the plugins has an error.
trans-unit.target: 一旦其中一个插件出现错误,执行就会停止。

trans-unit.source: The expected return type from this filter depends on the value passed in the request query vars:
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器的预期返回类型取决于请求查询变量中传递的值。

trans-unit.source: The expected return type from this filter depends on the value passed in the request query_vars. When $this->query_vars['count'] is set, the filter should return the network count as an int. When 'ids' === $this->query_vars['fields'], the filter should return an array of network IDs. Otherwise the filter should return an array of WP_Network objects.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器的预期返回类型取决于在请求query_vars中传递的值。设置 $this->query_vars['count'] ，过滤器应以int形式返回网络计数。当 'ids' === $this->query_vars['fields'] ，过滤器应返回一个网络ID数组。否则，筛选器应返回WP_Network对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: The expected return type from this filter depends on the value passed in the request query_vars: When $this->query_vars['count'] is set, the filter should return the site count as an int. When 'ids' === $this->query_vars['fields'], the filter should return an array of site IDs. Otherwise the filter should return an array of WP_Site objects.
trans-unit.target: 此过滤器的预期返回类型取决于在请求query_vars中传递的值：设置 $this->query_vars['count'] ，过滤器应将站点计数作为整数返回。当 'ids' === $this->query_vars['fields'] ，过滤器应返回一个站点ID数组。否则，过滤器应返回WP_Site对象的数组。

trans-unit.source: The explanatory message regarding the password.
trans-unit.target: 关于密码的说明信息。

trans-unit.source: The export file URL.
trans-unit.target: 输出文件的URL。

trans-unit.source: The export files are stored in wp-content/uploads, and are therefore publicly accessible. A CSPRN is appended to the filename to mitigate the risk of an unauthorized person downloading the file, but it is still possible. Deleting the file after the data subject has had a chance to delete it adds an additional layer of protection.
trans-unit.target: 导出文件存储在 wp-content/uploads 中，因此可以公开访问。将CSPRN附加到文件名以减轻未经授权的人下载文件的风险，但是仍然可以这样做。数据主体有机会删除文件后删除文件会增加一层保护。

trans-unit.source: The extension slug. The plugin or theme's directory.
trans-unit.target: 扩展的slug。插件或主题的目录。

trans-unit.target: 扩展类型。可以是 "插件 "或 "主题"。

trans-unit.source: The feed type to link to, such as 'rss2'. Defaults to default feed type.
trans-unit.target: 要链接到的feed类型,例如'rss2'。默认为默认的feed类型。

trans-unit.source: The feed type to link to. Possible values include 'rss2', 'atom'. Default is the value of get_default_feed().
trans-unit.target: 链接到的提要类型。可能的值包括“ rss2”，“ atom”。默认值为get_default_feed（）的值。

trans-unit.source: The feed widget can not have more than 20 items or it will reset back to the default, which is 10.
trans-unit.target: feed小组件不能有超过20个项目,否则会重置为默认值,即10个。

trans-unit.source: The field to use when ordering the images. Default 'menu_order ID'. Accepts any valid SQL ORDERBY statement.
trans-unit.target: 订购图片时要使用的字段。默认为'menu_order ID'。接受任何有效的SQL ORDERBY语句。

trans-unit.source: The field(s) to order by.
trans-unit.target: 要排序的领域:

trans-unit.source: The file path relative to wp-content/uploads.
trans-unit.target: 相对于 wp-content/uploads 的文件路径。

trans-unit.source: The file that defines this function (wp-admin/includes/plugin.php) is only loaded in the admin sections. In order to use is_plugin_active_for_network outside the admin pages, it’s necessary to include or require plugin.php before trying to use it (as shown in the example).
trans-unit.target: 定义此功能的文件（ wp-admin/includes/plugin.php ）仅在admin部分中加载。为了在管理页面之外使用 is_plugin_active_for_network ，有必要在尝试使用它之前包含或要求 plugin.php （如示例所示）。

trans-unit.source: The file that defines this function (wp-admin/includes/user.php) is only loaded in the admin sections.
trans-unit.target: 定义此功能的文件（ wp-admin/includes/user.php ）仅在admin部分中加载。

trans-unit.source: The file with the plugin data is the file that will be included and therefore needs to have the main execution for the plugin. This does not mean everything must be contained in the file and it is recommended that the file be split for maintainability. Keep everything in one file for extreme optimization purposes.
trans-unit.target: 包含插件数据的文件是将被包含的文件,因此需要有插件的主要执行。这并不意味着所有的东西都必须包含在文件中,为了便于维护,建议将文件拆分。为了极度优化的目的,把所有的东西都放在一个文件中。

trans-unit.source: The filename is based off the passed parameter or defaults to the current unix timestamp, while the directory can either be passed as well, or by leaving it blank, default to a writable temporary directory.
trans-unit.target: 文件名是基于传递的参数,或者默认为当前的unix时间戳,而目录也可以传递,或者通过留空,默认为一个可写的临时目录。

trans-unit.source: The filename of a Page’s assigned custom template is stored as the value of a Custom Field with a key named
trans-unit.target: 页面分配的自定义模板的文件名存储为“自定义字段”的值，其键名为

trans-unit.source: The filenames in the $attachments attribute have to be filesystem paths.
trans-unit.target: $attachments 属性中的文件名必须是文件系统路径。

trans-unit.source: The files in the $_new_bundled_files list will be added to the installation if the version is greater than or equal to the old version being upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 如果版本大于或等于要升级的旧版本，则 $_new_bundled_files 列表中的文件将被添加到安装中。

trans-unit.source: The files in the $_old_files list will be removed and the new files copied from the zip file after the database is upgraded.
trans-unit.target: 数据库升级后，将删除 $_old_files 列表中的文件，并从zip文件复制新文件。

trans-unit.source: The filter ‘format_for_editor’ is applied here. If $text is empty the filter will be applied to an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器'format_for_editor'在这里应用。如果 $text 为空，则过滤器将应用于空字符串。

trans-unit.source: The filter ‘js_escape’ is also applied by esc_js().
trans-unit.target: 过滤器'js_escape'也由esc_js（）应用。

trans-unit.source: The filter accepts an array of non-default cron schedules in arrays (an array of arrays). The outer array has a key that is the name of the schedule (for example, ‘weekly’). The value is an array with two keys, one is ‘interval’ and the other is ‘display’.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器接受数组中的非默认cron计划数组（数组数组）。外部数组具有一个密钥，该密钥是日程表的名称（例如，“ weekly”）。该值是一个带有两个键的数组，一个键是“ interval”，另一个键是“ display”。

trans-unit.source: The filter bar container is rendered by @see render_template().
trans-unit.target: 筛选器栏容器由@see render_template() 呈现。

trans-unit.source: The filter can also be used to modify non-standard [items]_per_page settings. See the parent function for a full list of standard options.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器也可以用来修改非标准的[项目]_per_page设置。标准选项的完整列表请参见父函数。

trans-unit.source: The filter evaluates just following the location where the ‘login-password’ field is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器仅在显示“登录密码”字段的位置之后进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter evaluates just following the opening form tag element.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器就在打开的表单标签元素之后进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter evaluates just preceding the closing form tag element.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器会在关闭表单标签元素之前进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter function must return a $format value after it is finished processing or the search form will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器函数必须在完成处理后返回$ format值，否则搜索表单将为空。

trans-unit.source: The filter function must return a value after it is finished processing or the result will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器函数必须在完成处理后返回一个值，否则结果将为空。

trans-unit.source: The filter hook follows the format ‘bulk_actions-screenid‘, where screenid is the id of the admin screen that you want to affect.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器挂钩的格式为“ bulk_actions-screenid ”，其中screenid是您要影响的管理屏幕的ID。

trans-unit.source: The filter hook is applied in the default check_admin_referrer() function after the nonce has been checked for security purposes; this allows a plugin to force WordPress to die for extra security reasons. Note that check_admin_referrer is also a “pluggable” function, meaning that plugins can override it.
trans-unit.target: 为了安全起见，检查随机数后，将在默认的 check_admin_referrer() 函数中应用过滤器挂钩；这允许插件出于额外的安全原因而迫使WordPress死亡。请注意，check_admin_referrer也是“可插入”功能，这意味着插件可以覆盖它。

trans-unit.source: The filter is applied to the URL returned by the function wp_lostpassword_url(), allowing the developer to have that function direct users to a specific (different) URL for retrieving a lost password.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器将应用于函数wp_lostpassword_url（）返回的URL ，从而使开发人员能够使用该函数将用户定向到特定（不同的）URL，以检索丢失的密码。

trans-unit.source: The filter is evaluated for all image sizes except ‘full’.
trans-unit.target: 将针对除“满”以外的所有图像尺寸评估滤镜。

trans-unit.source: The filter is evaluated only for hierarchical post types.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器仅对层次化的职位类型进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter is evaluated only for non-hierarchical post types.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器仅对非层次的职位类型进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter is first evaluated after the zip file for the latest version has been downloaded and unzipped. It is evaluated five more times during the process:

trans-unit.source: The filter is only applied on the front end.

trans-unit.source: The filter is only evaluated if a true value is passed to the $filter argument in wp_generate_tag_cloud().
trans-unit.target: 仅当将真值传递给wp_generate_tag_cloud（）中的$ filter参数时，才对过滤器求值。

trans-unit.source: The filter is only evaluated if fopen is enabled on the server.
trans-unit.target: 只有当服务器上的fopen被启用时,过滤器才会被评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter is only evaluated if the NOBLOGREDIRECT constant is defined.
trans-unit.target: 只有在定义了NOBLOGREDIRECT常量的情况下,才会对该过滤器进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter is only evaluated if the file isn’t stored locally and allow_url_fopen is enabled on the server.
trans-unit.target: 仅当文件未存储在本地且服务器上启用了 allow_url_fopen 时，才对过滤器进行评估。

trans-unit.source: The filter is used to change the types of HTML elements/attributes or context names are allowed in WordPress content, then strips any HTML elements/attributes that are registered as not allowed.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器用于改变WordPress内容中允许的HTML元素/属性或上下文名称的类型,然后剥离任何被注册为不允许的HTML元素/属性。

trans-unit.source: The filter modifies the “from name” used in an email sent using the wp_mail() function. When used together with the ‘wp_mail_from‘ filter, it creates a from address like “Name <first.last@example.com>”. The filter should return a string.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器修改使用wp_mail（）函数发送的电子邮件中使用的“来自名称” 。与“ wp_mail_from ”过滤器一起使用时，它会创建一个发件人地址，例如“ Name <first.last@example.com>”。过滤器应返回一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: The filter name is dynamic and depends on the $field parameter of the function.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器名称是动态的,取决于函数的$field参数。

trans-unit.source: The filter permits full control over what HTML attributes are added to menus generated with the WP Menu API.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器允许完全控制HTML属性被添加到使用WP Menu API生成的菜单中。

trans-unit.source: The filter runs only once, the first time wptexturize() is called.
trans-unit.target: 筛选器仅运行一次，第一次调用wptexturize（）。

trans-unit.source: The filter specifies which of the default plugins included in WordPress should be added to the TinyMCE instance.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器指定WordPress中包含的哪些默认插件应该被添加到TinyMCE实例中。

trans-unit.source: The filter takes an associative array (‘plugin_name’ => ‘path’) where ‘path’ is the include path to the file.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器采用关联数组（“ plugin_name” =>“ path”），其中“ path”是文件的包含路径。

trans-unit.source: The filter takes an associative array of external plugins for TinyMCE in the form ‘plugin_name’ => ‘url’.
trans-unit.target: 该过滤器采用TinyMCE的外部插件的关联数组，格式为'plugin_name'=>'url'。

trans-unit.source: The filter's default value is true rather than null.
trans-unit.target: 过滤器的默认值为 true 而不是 null 。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string is, with empty matches property value, ‘$NUM’. The ‘NUM’ will be replaced with the value in the $number parameter. With the matches property not empty, the value of the returned string will contain that value of the matches property. The format then will be ‘$MATCHES[NUM]’, with MATCHES as the value in the property and NUM the value of the $number parameter.
trans-unit.target: 字符串的格式为空匹配属性值'$ NUM'。“ NUM”将替换为$ number参数中的值。在matchs属性不为空的情况下，返回的字符串的值将包含matchs属性的值。格式将为'$ MATCHES [NUM]'，其中MATCHES为属性中的值，NUM为$ number参数的值。

trans-unit.source: The function should be called using the wp_enqueue_scripts action hook if you want to call it on the front-end of the site, like in the examples above. To call it on the administration screens, use the admin_enqueue_scripts action hook. For the login screen, use the login_enqueue_scripts action hook. Calling it outside of an action hook can lead to problems, see the ticket #11526 for details.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想在站点的前端调用该函数，则应该使用wp_enqueue_scripts操作钩子来调用该函数，就像上面的示例一样。要在管理屏幕上调用它，请使用admin_enqueue_scripts操作挂钩。对于登录屏幕，请使用login_enqueue_scripts操作挂钩。在动作挂钩之外调用它可能会导致问题，有关详细信息，请参见故障单＃11526。

trans-unit.source: The function should be called using the wp_enqueue_scripts or init action hook if you want to call it on the front-end of the site. To call it on the administration screens, use the admin_enqueue_scripts action hook. For the login screen, use the login_enqueue_scripts action hook. Calling it outside of an action hook can often lead to unexpected results and should be avoided.

trans-unit.source: The function should be called using the wp_enqueue_scripts action hook if you want to call it on the front-end of the site. To call it on the administration screens, use the admin_enqueue_scripts action hook. For the login screen, use the login_enqueue_scripts action hook. Calling it outside of an action hook can often lead to unexpected results and should be avoided.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想在网站的前端调用这个函数,应该使用wp_enqueue_scripts动作钩子。如果要在管理界面调用它,请使用admin_enqueue_scripts动作钩子。对于登录界面,使用 login_enqueue_scripts 动作钩子。在动作钩子之外调用它通常会导致意想不到的结果,应该避免。

trans-unit.source: The function works by getting the single post meta name, named ‘_wp_attached_file’ and returning it. This is a convenience function to prevent looking up the meta name and provide a mechanism for sending the attached filename through a filter.

trans-unit.source: The given array of context values will not necessarily be available on the instance itself, but is treated as the full set of values provided by the block’s ancestry. This is assigned to the private available_context property. Only values which are configured to consumed by the block via its registered type will be assigned to the block’s context property.
trans-unit.target: 给定的上下文值数组不一定在实例本身上可用，而是被视为块祖先提供的完整值集。这已分配给private available_context 属性。只有配置为通过块的注册类型使用的值才会分配给块的 context 属性。

trans-unit.source: The given categories are checked against the post’s categories’ term_ids, names and slugs. Categories given as integers will only be checked against the post’s categories’ term_ids.
trans-unit.target: 将根据帖子类别的term_id，名称和子词检查给定类别。以整数形式给出的类别将仅根据帖子类别的term_ids进行检查。

trans-unit.source: The given tags are checked against the post’s tags’ term_ids, names and slugs. Tags given as integers will only be checked against the post’s tags’ term_ids. If no tags are given, determines if post has any tags.
trans-unit.target: 将根据帖子的标签的term_id，名称和标签检查给定的标签。以整数形式给出的标签将仅根据帖子的标签的term_ids进行检查。如果没有给出标签，则确定post是否有任何标签。

trans-unit.source: The given terms are checked against the object’s terms’ term_ids, names and slugs. Terms given as integers will only be checked against the object’s terms’ term_ids. If no terms are given, determines if object is associated with any terms in the given taxonomy.
trans-unit.target: 将根据对象的术语的term_id，名称和标记检查给定的术语。以整数形式给出的术语将仅根据对象术语的term_ids进行检查。如果没有给出术语，则确定对象是否与给定分类法中的任何术语相关联。

trans-unit.source: The given terms are checked against the post’s terms’ term_ids, names and slugs. Terms given as integers will only be checked against the post’s terms’ term_ids. If no terms are given, determines if post has any terms.
trans-unit.target: 将根据帖子的条款的term_id，名称和条款检查给定的条款。以整数形式给出的术语将仅根据帖子的term'ids进行检查。如果未给出任何条款，请确定帖子中是否有任何条款。

trans-unit.source: The most appropriate use for get_posts is to create an array of posts based on a set of parameters. It retrieves a list of recent posts or posts matching this criteria. get_posts can also be used to create Multiple Loops, though a more direct reference to WP_Query using new WP_Query is preferred in this case.
trans-unit.target: get_posts的最合适用法是根据一组参数创建一个帖子数组。它检索最近的帖子列表或符合此条件的帖子。get_posts也可以用于创建多个循环，尽管在这种情况下，最好使用新的WP_Query直接引用WP_Query。

trans-unit.source: The most logically usage of this function is redirecting changed post objects, so that those that linked to an changed post will be redirected to the new post.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数最符合逻辑的用法是重定向改变后的帖子对象,这样那些链接到改变后的帖子的对象将被重定向到新的帖子。

trans-unit.source: The old way to serialize the callback caused issues and this function is the solution. It works by checking for objects and creating a new property in the class to keep track of the object and new objects of the same class that need to be added.

trans-unit.source: The only major difference is that on multisite site-wide options will not autoload and on a single site the option will autoload. Unlike when using add_option() on a single site, the feature cannot be overridden.
trans-unit.target: 唯一的主要区别是，在多站点站点范围内的选项不会自动加载，而在单个站点上该选项将自动加载。与在单个站点上使用add_option（）不同，该功能不能被覆盖。

trans-unit.target: pair应该被认为是调用者支持的所有属性,并以列表形式给出。返回的属性将只包含$pairs列表中的属性。

trans-unit.source: The parameter $data should be either an associative array containing the indices names below or a header string detailing it.
trans-unit.target: 参数$data应该是一个包含下面索引名称的关联数组,或者是一个详细说明它的头字符串。

trans-unit.source: The parameter $stylesheet is the name of the stylesheet, relative to the theme root. It also accepts an array of stylesheets. It is optional and defaults to ‘editor-style.css’.
trans-unit.target: 参数$ stylesheet是样式表的名称，相对于主题根目录。它还接受样式表数组。它是可选的，默认为'editor-style.css'。

trans-unit.source: The parameter should only be passed a variable and not create the array or object inline to the parameter. The reason for this is that parameter is passed by reference and PHP will fail unless it has the variable.
trans-unit.target: 参数应该只传递一个变量,而不是在参数的内部创建数组或对象。原因是参数是通过引用传递的,除非有变量,否则PHP会失败。

trans-unit.source: The parameters must not be considered optional. All of the post meta fields will be retrieved and only the meta field key values returned.
trans-unit.target: 这些参数不能被认为是可选的。所有的职位元字段将被检索,只返回元字段的键值。

trans-unit.source: The parameters of get_posts are similar to those of get_pages but are implemented quite differently, and should be used in appropriate scenarios. get_posts uses WP_Query, whereas get_pages queries the database more directly. Each have parameters that reflect this difference in implementation.
trans-unit.target: get_posts的参数与get_pages的参数相似，但实现方式完全不同，因此应在适当的情况下使用。get_posts使用WP_Query，而get_pages更直接地查询数据库。每个参数都有反映这种实现差异的参数。

trans-unit.source: The passed WP_User_Query object contains SQL parts formed from parsing the given query.
trans-unit.target: 传递的WP_User_Query对象包含通过解析给定查询形成的SQL部分。

trans-unit.source: The passed WP_User_Query object contains the query variables, not yet passed into SQL.
trans-unit.target: 传递的WP_User_Query对象包含尚未传递到SQL的查询变量。

trans-unit.source: The password is passed through esc_attr() to ensure that it is safe for placing in an HTML attribute.
trans-unit.target: 密码通过esc_attr（）传递，以确保可以安全地放置在HTML属性中。

trans-unit.target: 密码通过esc_attr（）传递，以确保可以安全地放置在html属性中。

trans-unit.source: The password of the site owner, if their user account didn't already exist.
trans-unit.target: 网站所有者的密码,如果他们的用户账户还不存在的话。

trans-unit.target: 访问该职位的密码。默认为空。

trans-unit.source: The path is relative to the current upload dir.
trans-unit.target: 该路径是相对于当前的上传目录而言的。

trans-unit.source: The permalink mode title will use the post title for the ‘a’ element ‘id’ attribute. The id mode uses ‘post-‘ with the post ID for the ‘id’ attribute.
trans-unit.target: 永久链接模式标题将使用帖子标题作为'a'元素的'id'属性。id模式将'post-'与发布ID一起用于'id'属性。

trans-unit.source: The permalink structure as in the database. This is what you set on the Permalink Options page, and includes ‘tags’ like %year%, %month% and %post_id%.
trans-unit.target: 数据库中的永久链接结构。这是您在“永久链接选项”页面上设置的内容，并包括“标签”，例如％year％，％month％和％post_id％。

trans-unit.source: The permalink structure for the date, if not set already depends on the permalink structure. It can be one of three formats. The first is year, month, day; the second is day, month, year; and the last format is month, day, year. These are matched against the permalink structure for which one is used. If none matches, then the default will be used, which is year, month, day.
trans-unit.target: 日期的permalink结构,如果尚未设置,则取决于permalink结构。它可以是三种格式之一。第一种是年、月、日;第二种是日、月、年;最后一种格式是月、日、年。这些格式与使用的permalink结构相匹配,如果没有匹配,则默认为年、月、日。如果没有匹配,则使用默认值,即年、月、日。

trans-unit.source: The permalink structure is front property, author base, and finally ‘/%author%’. Will set the author_structure property and then return it without attempting to set the value again.
trans-unit.target: 永久链接结构是前端属性，作者基础，最后是'/％author％'。将设置author_structure属性，然后返回它，而无需再次尝试设置该值。

trans-unit.source: The permalink structure is root property, and ‘%pagename%’. Will set the page_structure property and then return it without attempting to set the value again.
trans-unit.target: 永久链接结构是root属性，并且是'％pagename％'。将设置page_structure属性，然后返回它而不尝试再次设置该值。

trans-unit.source: The permalink structure is root property, comment base property, feed base and finally ‘/%feed%’. Will set the comment_feed_structure property and then return it without attempting to set the value again.

trans-unit.source: The second filter, ‘get_image_tag’, has the HTML content, which can then be further manipulated by a plugin to change all attribute values and even HTML content.
trans-unit.target: 第二个过滤器“ get_image_tag”具有HTML内容，然后可以由插件对其进行进一步操作以更改所有属性值甚至HTML内容。

trans-unit.source: The second filter, ‘plugins_api’, allows a plugin to override the WordPress.org Plugin Installation API entirely. If $action is ‘query_plugins’ or ‘plugin_information’, an object MUST be passed. If $action is ‘hot_tags’ or ‘hot_categories’, an array MUST be passed.
trans-unit.target: 第二个过滤器“ plugins_api”允许插件完全覆盖WordPress.org插件安装API。如果 $action 是'query_plugins'或'plugin_information'，则必须传递一个对象。如果 $action 是'hot_tags'或'hot_categories'，则必须传递一个数组。

trans-unit.source: The second filter, ‘themes_api’, allows a plugin to override the WordPress.org Theme API entirely. If $action is ‘query_themes’, ‘theme_information’, or ‘feature_list’, an object MUST be passed. If $action is ‘hot_tags’, an array should be passed.
trans-unit.target: 第二个过滤器“ themes_api”允许插件完全覆盖WordPress.org主题API。如果 $action 为'query_themes'，'theme_information'或'feature_list'，则必须传递一个对象。如果 $action 为'hot_tags'，则应传递一个数组。

trans-unit.source: The second format will make the initial sorting order be descending
trans-unit.target: 第二种格式将使初始排序顺序为降序。

trans-unit.source: The second is during The Loop. WP_Query provides numerous functions for common tasks within The Loop. To begin with, have_posts(), which calls $wp_query->have_posts(), is called to see if there are any posts to show. If there are, a while loop is begun, using have_posts() as the condition. This will iterate around as long as there are posts to show. In each iteration, the_post(), which calls $wp_query->the_post() is called, setting up internal variables within $wp_query and the global $post variable (which the Template Tags rely on), as above. These are the functions you should use when writing a theme file that needs a loop.
trans-unit.target: 第二个是在The Loop中。 WP_Query 为The Loop中的常见任务提供了许多功能。首先，调用has_posts（）调用 $wp_query->have_posts() ，以查看是否有任何要显示的帖子。如果存在， while 使用have_posts（）作为条件，开始while循环。只要有要显示的帖子，它就会反复进行。在每次迭代中，the_post（） ，它调用 $wp_query->the_post() 被调用时，内设立内部变量 $wp_query 和全球 $post 变量（其中，模板标签依靠），如上所述。这些是编写需要循环的主题文件时应使用的功能。

trans-unit.source: The second value is an array containing the values of fields to be hidden.
trans-unit.target: 第二个值是一个包含要隐藏的字段值的数组。

trans-unit.source: The semantics seem rather fuzzy. If id is a WP_User or other object, or an array of properties, it seems to clone it without touching the cache. Otherwise if id is a number it seems to try to read it possibly from the cache, or from the database using ->get_data_by(), which can also update the cache. If id is empty it reads by login name.
trans-unit.target: 语义似乎很模糊。如果 id 是 WP_User 或其他对象或属性数组，则似乎可以在不触摸缓存的情况下对其进行克隆。否则，如果id是一个数字，它似乎可能尝试使用 ->get_data_by() 从缓存或从数据库中读取它，这也可以更新缓存。如果 id 为空，则按登录名读取。

trans-unit.source: The theme is broken, if it doesn’t have a parent theme and is missing either style.css and, or index.php. If the theme has a parent theme then it is broken, if it is missing style.css; index.php is optional.
trans-unit.target: 如果主题没有父主题，并且缺少style.css和或index.php，则该主题已损坏。如果该主题有一个父主题，那么它将丢失，如果缺少style.css;。index.php是可选的。

trans-unit.source: The theme may change the location of the stylesheet directory by either using the ‘stylesheet_directory_uri’ or ‘locale_stylesheet_uri’ filters.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用“ stylesheet_directory_uri”或“ locale_stylesheet_uri”过滤器，主题可以更改样式表目录的位置。
